name: product_showcase_5
description: Enhanced product advertisement template for the products

samples.heading: Healthy Happy Living
samples.subheading: Transform your lifestyle with our eco-friendly wellness products.

fieldPrompt.product_image: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality product image with a clean, modern aesthetic. Specify that the image should be well-lit and show the product from an appealing angle. Include details about resolution (at least 1000x1000px), background (transparent or solid), lighting setup, and composition to ensure professional results.
fieldPrompt.heading: Write a compelling heading (max 4 words, 30 characters) that captures attention and communicates your value proposition. Examples: Healthy Living Simplified, Premium Quality Goods, Your Dream Home Awaits. Focus on benefits and outcomes that resonate with your target audience.
fieldPrompt.subheading: Craft a brief description (max 40 words, 110 characters) that highlights key benefits or features. Examples: Experience the difference with our handcrafted, sustainable products designed for your wellbeing and comfort. Focus on what makes your offering unique and valuable to customers.
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Create a clear, action-oriented call-to-action (1-3 words) that encourages immediate response. Examples: Shop Now, Learn More, Get Started, Book Today, Call Now. Make it compelling and easy to understand.
fieldPrompt.contact_number: Enter your contact phone number with country code and clear formatting. Examples: Call: +1 (555) 123-4567 or WhatsApp: +1 555-123-4567. Include any relevant prefixes or instructions for customers.
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter your business website URL (e.g., yourbusiness.com, shop.yourbrand.com). Omit http:// or www for a cleaner, more professional appearance.
